titles.title: One Stop Shop for Small Business Licensing Act of 2023
One Stop Shop for Small Business Licensing Act of 2023

To require the Director of the Office of Entrepreneurship Education of the Small Business Administration to establish and maintain a website regarding small business permitting and licensing requirements, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary:
One Stop Shop for Small Business Licensing Act of 2023
This bill requires the Office of Entrepreneurship Education of the Small Business Administration to establish a website that provides licensing and business permit information for small businesses.
